## saveMnemonics

save mnemonics (secret phrase) to user device

### Parameters

-   `mnemonics` **[string][4]** 

Returns **[Promise][5]&lt;any>** 

## getMnemonics

get user mnemonics stored on device or generate a new one

Returns **[Promise][5]&lt;[string][4]>**
